properties.Name: Hops Restaurant, Bar, and Brewery
properties.Open: Sun 11 am-10 pm; Mon-Fri 11 am-11 pm; Sat 11 am-midnight
properties.Directions: Exit onto 4-Mile Run Trail, follow 0.15 mi, then right onto zig-zag trail uphill to Potomac Ave (no street sign), turn right and proceed 0.3 mi, then right on Reed Ave (no street sign) opposite Regal Cinema, follow 0.1 mi to brewpub
